name: Snaxe
description:
In this game you are a snake that eats grapes and rolls around, when you eat grapes you get bigger. try get as big as possible. You can change gamemodes as you please and find which one suits you best. More design and features coming soon.

Arrow keys to move around (you can't go directly backwards)

bump into walls to teleport to other side of map

original code from Basic Snake HTML Game · GitHub

Pro tip: Easier to play in full-screen
